name: Ristretto
steps: Grind your coffee finer than usual
Brew 0.75oz of espresso during 15 seconds max

name: Espresso
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds

name: Espresso Doppio
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds

name: Espressino
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Froth 1oz of cold milk until warm but no foam is present
Remove any foam with a spoon
Add frothed milk to coffee

name: Piccolo Latte
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Froth 1oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Café con Hielo
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Add some ice cubes

name: Caffè Freddo
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Add some ice cubes

name: Iced Espresso
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Mix coffee with 1oz of cold milk and simple syrup
Pour mixture over demitasse with ice cubes on it

name: Café Bombón
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Add 1oz of condensed milk on top

name: Raf
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Add 1.5 tablespoons of vanilla sugar to coffee
Top drink with 1oz of cream

name: Breve
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 2oz of cold half and half until foamy
Add frothed half and half on top of coffee

name: Cortado
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 2oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Cortadito
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 2oz of cold milk until warm but no foam is present
Remove any foam with a spoon
Add frothed milk to coffee

name: Macchiato
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 1oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Stain coffee with frothed milk, pouring over a small area

name: Lungo
steps: Grind your coffee coarser than usual
Brew 3oz of espresso during 40 seconds max

name: Flat White
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 3oz of cold milk until as silky as possible and a thin layer of microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Americano
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Add 4oz of hot water to coffee

name: Long Black
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds on a demitasse
Add 4oz of hot water to a 7oz tasse
Pour coffee on hot water, to preserve crema

name: Cà Phê Sữa Đá
steps: Add 1oz of condensed milk to a 7oz tasse
Get the darkest coffee you have
Grind your coffee finer than usual
Slow brew 6oz of espresso (3 espresso doppi during 20-35 seconds each)
Stir the coffee with the condensed milk
Add some ice

name: Café con Leche
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds on a demitasse
Stir in 3oz of warm milk
Add 2 tablespoons of sugar

name: Cappuccino
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and foamy
Stir cup to stain the walls with coffee
Pour frothed milk from the long side, in the center of the cup
Make sure to have foam at the top
Add cocoa powder on top

name: Caffè Latte
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Froth 3oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Pour frother milk from the beak, in 2 steps
First, add from a higher distance and mix in milk with the stream
Second, add from a lower distance and cut the milk forward

name: Café au Lait
steps: Brew 3oz of espresso for 40 seconds max
Froth 3oz of cold milk until foamy and silky
Reserve the foam before mixing with coffee
Add frothed milk to coffee
Add foam on top

name: Matcha Latte
steps: Sift 1 teaspoon of matcha into a cappuccino mug
Pour 2oz of water on mug and stir until matcha dissolves
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of matcha

name: Chai Latte
steps: Make 2oz of chai tea using 2oz of water and a 1oz of chai spices/black tea
Pour tea onto a cappuccino mug
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of tea

name: Dirty Chai
steps: Make 2oz of chai tea using 2oz of water and a 1oz of chai spices/black tea
Pour tea onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds
Pour coffee onto mug and mix
Froth 3oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of mug

name: Mocha
steps: Make 2oz of hot chocolate
Pour chocolate onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds
Pour coffee onto mug and mix
Froth 2oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top
Add whipped cream with cocoa powder sprinkles to top off drink

name: Red Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds onto a demitasse
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Black Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds onto a demitasse
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Dead Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 3oz of espresso for 40 seconds max onto a 5oz tasse
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Lazy Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped decaf coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 3oz of espresso for 40 seconds max onto a 5oz tasse
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Latte Macchiato
steps: Froth 5oz of cold milk until foamy and silky
Pour milk onto a tumbler glass
Let the milk sit, so that the foam separates from the milk
Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds onto a demitasse
Stain milk with espresso, pouring over a small area, slowly

name: Frappé
steps: Blend 2oz of instant coffee and 0.5oz of sugar with 5.5oz milk
Pour mixture onto a tumbler glass with ice cubes
Add whipped cream with cocoa powder sprinkles to top off drink
